document.full_text: a fifa ethics panel on sunday suspended two of the organization's most powerful figures, mohamed bin hammam of qatar and jack warner of trinidad and tobago, after they were accused of corruption.
document.title: fifa clears blatter and suspends two others
lines_and_colors: a fifa ethics panel on sunday suspended two of the organization's most powerful figures, mohamed bin hammam of qatar and jack warner of trinidad and tobago, after they were accused of corruption.
